title: Learning Through Play
creator_credit: Nicholas Alexander, Don Hauser, Monash University and World Organisation for early Childhood Development
brief_description: Looks at play amongst three year-olds and the more highly developed and realistic play of five year-olds. Shows the role of the teacher in various situations providing challenging equipment to extend the interests of the children and in guiding play to complement structured learning.
creator_credit_for_label: Nicholas Alexander, Don Hauser, Monash University and World Organisation for early Childhood Development
